# git

Git settings.


**Type:** attribute set of (submodule)

**Default:** `{ }`

## git.autoPrune

Automatically remove any remote-tracking references that no longer exist on the remote.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `true`

## git.defaultBranch

Set the default name when initializing a new repo.

::: info

When not set, the app defaults to `main`.

:::

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** null or string

**Default:** `null`

## git.deleteOrigAfterMerge

Automatically delete `.orig` files created by GitKraken client during a merge.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `false`

## git.detectConflicts

Enable proactive detection of merge conflicts with target branch.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `true`

## git.fetchInterval

Set the number of minutes between auto-fetches, or 0 to disable them.

::: info

All visible remotes for the repository will be fetched.

:::

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** integer between 0 and 60 (both inclusive)

**Default:** `1`

## git.package

The git package to use. <br/>
::: info

This is only used if [`git.useBundledGit`](#gitusebundledgit) is disabled.

:::

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-globe"></i> Global</Badge>

**Type:** package

**Default:** `pkgs.git`

## git.syncConfig

Automatically update the global Git configuration with the name and email address of the current profile.

::: info

If the global Git configuration is managed through Nix, this option will not have any effect.

:::

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-globe"></i> Global</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `false`

## git.updateSubmodules

Automatically keep submodules up to date when performing Git actions.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `true`

## git.useBundledGit

When this option is enabled, GitKraken will use the bundled [NodeGit](https://www.nodegit.org/) library.

When this option is disabled, GitKraken will use the [`git.package`](#gitpackage) option to install Git and set it as the selected Git binary used for certain Git actions including fetching and committing. This may provide increased performance and compatibility with certain projects and development environments.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-globe"></i> Global</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `false`

## git.useGitCredentialManager

Use the [Git credential manager](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Tools-Credential-Storage) to access Git repositories.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-users"></i> Profile</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `false`
